author: buscob
msg: This allows to show a content element in a portalPage.
A further improvement of this portlet will be to allow a content element list to be shown given the element's father.
Having the application's main page replaced with a portalPage will allow the user to edit this page using the CMS.

author: tabish
msg: Some recent changes broke Windows DLL builds, fix some of those errors.

author: jplevyak
msg: TS-133/TS-13: fix for 64-bit issue with header marshaling, also add a regression test for
header marshaling/demarshaling which exposd the bug.
